game.name: Papercraft Tactics
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Arrange a living backpack of swords, potions, and trinkets to auto‑battle foes in a paper‑theater roguelike. Link items to trigger chain reactions, play tactical cards, and outsmart bosses run after run.
